meanings.definition: A currently circulating story or report of uncertain or doubtful truth.
meanings.sent1: The rumors about the new student were not true.
meanings.sent2: She heard rumors about a surprise party for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The rumors of a talking dog in the park made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The rumors of a ghost haunting the old house sent shivers down her spine.
meanings.sent5: The rumors of a treasure buried in the backyard spread quickly through the neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The office was buzzing with rumors about the upcoming promotion.
meanings.sent2: She didn't pay attention to the rumors about her friends.
meanings.sent3: The rumors about the alien invasion were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The rumors of a secret affair between the two celebrities were all over the tabloids.
meanings.sent5: The rumors of a magical potion that could grant wishes were too good to be true.
